population.title: Population
population.description: Total population in geographic region [*deprecated*: refer to summary for this]

cumulativeConfirmedCases.title: Cumulativeconfirmedcases
cumulativeConfirmedCases.description: Number of confirmed cases so far

cumulativePositiveTests.title: Cumulativepositivetests
cumulativePositiveTests.description: Number of positive test results to date

cumulativeNegativeTests.title: Cumulativenegativetests
cumulativeNegativeTests.description: Number of negative test results to date

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: *deprecated*: Capacity for resource. In the case of ICUs, this refers to total capacity. For hospitalization this refers to free capacity for COVID patients. This value is calculated by (1 - typicalUsageRate) * totalCapacity * 2.07

currentUsageCovid.title: Currentusagecovid
currentUsageCovid.description: Currently used capacity for resource by COVID

currentUsageTotal.title: Currentusagetotal
currentUsageTotal.description: Currently used capacity for resource by all patients (COVID + Non-COVID)

typicalUsageRate.title: Typicalusagerate
typicalUsageRate.description: Typical used capacity rate for resource. This excludes any COVID usage.
